arts.ttl: Controversial Lea Schuller strike sees Germany close in on Euro 2025 quarter-finals and leaves Denmark on the brink of elimination after VAR-dominated encounter | Goal.com English Saudi Arabia
arts.sum: Germany came from behind to record a vital win over Denmark in the European Championship group stages, albeit in controversial circumstances.

Live updates on the action in Basel (5pm BST) Email Sarah | Complete guide to all 368 players at Euro 2025 If you want to learn more about any individual player at this year’s tournament, the Guardian have the perfect tool for you. This is a guide to all 368 players at the competition: While Denmark manager Andrée Jeglertz has said: We still have it in our own hands, and that’s our focus, not on speculation about whether a point would be useful or anything like that. We believe we are in a good place as a squad. Against Sweden we defended in a good way. There were three shots on target for them and three for us. Of course they had possession but we gave it to them where they should have it, so the defensive shape was good. Continue reading...
